ingredients.title: For the muffins
ingredients.list:
300g wheat floor
1 tbsp vegetable oil, double refined
1 tsp sugar
1 cup water

ingredients.title: For cream and toppings
ingredients.list:
2 cup cream, fresh
2 tbsp sugar
2 tbsp cocoa powder
1 tsp vanilla essence
12 strawberries, medium sized
1/2 cup milk cream
